title: Fiat S.p.A. - Wikipedia
snippet: Fiat was founded in 1899 by a group of investors, including Giovanni Agnelli. During its more than century-long history, Fiat has also manufactured railway engines and carriages, military vehicles, farm tractors, and aircraft.

title: Who Owns Alfa Romeo | Alfa Romeo FIAT of Santa Monica
snippet: In early 2021, the PSA group (which owned Peugeot, Citroen, DS, Vauxhall, and Opel) merged with FCA (which owned Fiat, Chrysler, Dodge, RAM, Jeep, and Alfa Romeo) to form Stellantis, and that’s where things stand. Here at Alfa Romeo FIAT of Santa Monica, we’re very excited about what this means for the future of the brand! Regardless of ownership, the people in charge of Alfa Romeo have always dedicated themselves to ensuring these vehicles were fun to drive and impressive to look at.
